attributes.action: resign if he loses more than 500 seats (net) at the upcoming local election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Should Labour lose more than 500 seats at the upcoming local elections on Thursday 1st May 2008, the prime minister should resign immediately, Friday morning, prompting a leadership race within the Labour party.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
